concept.title: Software Domain Elements
concept.shortdesc: The elements in the software domain each have a specific semantic purpose.

dlentry.dd: message phraseA server log entry I:O is equivalent to the text message: Information successful.
message blockThe following are the server log entry codes:I:0 I:1 P:0 P:1
message numberA server log entry 65 is equivalent to the text message: Information successful
command nameUse the dir command to list all files and folders in a selected directory.
variable (to be provided by user) nameUse the dir /p to pause at the end of each page. You need to press a key to see the rest of information.
file name or path, or URIThe server log is saved in the log.txt file.
user inputAfter you type cd.., enter dirat the prompt.

system outputThe following list of files and folders are listed at the console:
C:\>dir Volume in drive C is Windows Volume Serial Number is CA39-F4E9 Directory of C:\ 04-09-2023 10:40 <DIR> AppData 09-03-2024 12:06 <DIR> DATA 24-03-2024 12:35 <DIR> DitaWorkshop 12-10-2023 13:22 12,288 DumpStack.log 04-09-2023 10:41 988,606 install.log 04-09-2023 10:41 <DIR> Kairos 07-05-2022 10:54 <DIR> PerfLogs 09-03-2024 22:45 <DIR> Program Files 30-09-2023 21:05 <DIR> Program Files (x86) 28-08-2023 11:54 <DIR> SWSetup 22-08-2023 17:39 <DIR> Users 17-03-2024 13:35 <DIR> Windows 2 File(s) 1,000,894 bytes 10 Dir(s) 322,949,386,240 bytes free
